about_the_game:
Surround yourself with a dark aura and enter the world of extinct minds...

CYBER.one: Racing For Souls is an innovative action game that combines intense on-foot and vehicular stages with a terrifying atmosphere in the world of cybernetic reality.
Prepare yourself for a journey through devastated lands where robots and transilludes reign, and every step threatens to subject you once again to the cyber collective ready to consume your body and mind, even though you managed to escape its dark grip once before.
Experience the extraordinary thrill of driving at breakneck speed in a multidimensional world, but remember that sometimes you need to disembark to reach places inaccessible to vehicles.


As you traverse the roads alone, confront opponents and yourself to uncover the story and... perhaps change it. The cybernetic world knows that you have escaped and will do everything in its power to enslave you again. However, by acquiring items and upgrading your vehicle, you will enter realms where the boundaries of imagination merge into one. In the battle against machines, you will receive support from a mysterious transwoman, your great love, who has preserved a fraction of humanity within her and fights her own battle against the new, dark nature.
Survive in this harsh world to find answers to the questions: Has all of humanity become extinct? How did this happen? Can it be reversed?

You possess a superb car with immense power, but despite its capabilities, the fate of the game relies solely on your skills. Use the handbrake on turns and obstacles to overcome distances in an even more spectacular and lightning-fast manner. The time has come to face a brutal simulation head-on.


Key features of the game::

Adventure: Immerse yourself in the darkness of the world as you engage in a dramatic struggle against the tyranny of the system. The interactive world is constantly changing, and it is up to you to determine how it all unfolds.

Diversity: Be prepared for dynamic and diverse gameplay that constantly surprises you.

Arcade: The car doesn't drive itself, and whether you triumph or the machines do depends on your decisions. Races, skill challenges, time trials, and adventure quests await you in the game.

Enemies: Demons of speed lurk in the dark cyberspace, controlled by artificial intelligence, standing in the way of achieving your goal.

Sound: Captivating sound and a powerful soundtrack create a unique game atmosphere that penetrates deep into your bones.


-----------------------------------------------------------------

name: CYBER.one: Racing For Souls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7, 8, 10 - 64bit
  • Processor: duo 2,8GHz
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 720, Radeon 7800
  • Sound Card: directx 9c
  • Additional Notes: indulgence

short_description: Immerse in the aura of adrenaline and horror in the world of CYBER.one - an innovative action game that takes you beyond the digital gates of dark nightmares. Experience survival, mystery, and machine confrontation in a multidimensional cybernetic reality.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Italian, French, Arabic, Czech, Danish, Greek, Dutch, Japanese, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
*languages with full audio support
